title: J4 pressed R on a group of kids in wheelchairs.
body:
J4 "Outplayed"

http://youtu.be/KlNK7TBk_lo

Riot why does this freelo champ even exist?


Free passive that gives him the ability to take a huge chunks of health with his auto
AoE Q with the hitbox of Africa that reduces armor
A massive shield with an aoe slow that last for days
An E that grants him free AS steroids and armor
Free flash
A gap closer ult that does a ton of dmg and traps anyone with no escape

Riot may I have what you smoked the day you made J4?
